permissions.name: Manage Embedded Scripts
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify embedded scripts on the site.

docs.summary: Inject a script in an app with an existing embedded script component, with the given parameters

permissions.name: Manage Your App
permissions.description: Request permission to manage basic app activity.

docs.summary: Retrieves data about the installation of your app on the user's website

permissions.name: Manage Embedded Scripts
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify embedded scripts on the site.

docs.summary:
Retrieves this app's existing embedded script parameters
 If the app does not have an embed on the site, this endpoint will return 404

permissions.name: Manage Your App
permissions.description: Request permission to manage basic app activity.

docs.summary:
The Purchase History API provides a list of your user's purchase history for your app (particularly relevant for one-time purchases).  
 Note: Cancellations of recurring plans are not included.

permissions.name: Manage Your App
permissions.description: Request permission to manage basic app activity.

params.name: productId
params.doc: Product to bill the user for (details taken from Developers Center).

params.name: successUrl
params.doc: URL to redirect user to after a successful purchase.

params.name: testCheckout
params.doc: Whether this checkout is for testing purposes only (relevant only for in-app purchases). When true, the price charged will be 0.00

docs.summary:
The Wix Billing API enables your app to lead customers seamlessly into Wix's checkout process from your platform (e.g., hosting your app's pricing page independently and redirecting to Wix checkout for purchase).
The returned checkout link is valid for 48 hours.
Note: Use of this functionality is dependent on [setup in the Wix Developers Center](https://devforum.wix.com/en/article/setting-up-an-external-pricing-page).

permissions.name: Manage Your App
permissions.description: Request permission to manage basic app activity.

params.name: eventName
params.doc:
- "APP_DASHBOARD_LOADED" - should be fired each time your app's dashboard is loaded by a user,
- "APP_FINISHED_CONFIGURATION" - should be fired when the user is completely onboarded and has completed all required configurations for the app to function properly,
- "APP_UPGRADED" - should be fired when a user upgrades the app to a higher plan (when the upgrade and checkout flow is done on the app side and not via Wix),
- "PRIMARY_ACTION_PERFORMED" - should be fired every time a user triggers the primary action in the app (for example, “review written” for a product reviews app),
- "CUSTOM" -  should be fired for any other event which is not supported by the above. When sending this event. Make sure to also send `customEventName`,
- "CHARGE" - should be fired each time you charge money from the user, can be fired for a new purchase or subscription renewal,
- "FUNDS_RETURNED" - should be fired each time you send money back to the users. Can be for refunds or chargebacks for example.

params.name: customEventName
params.doc: Custom event name. required when eventName = "CUSTOM".

params.name: eventData
params.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Additional data about the event.

docs.summary: Submit a BI event to Wix.

body:
curl -X POST \
 https://www.wixapis.com/apps/v1/bi-event \
 -H 'Authorization: <AUTH>' \
 -d '{
       "eventName": "CUSTOM",
      "customEventName": "Contact form submitted",
      "eventData": {
         "User name": "John Doe",
         "Title": "Need help with the app",
         "Description": "I've run into a little bit of an issue with my app"
      },

docs.summary: When you sign up for the App Installed webhook, you will receive this notification when your app is installed on a site
When you sign up for the App Removed webhook, you will receive this notification when your app is uninstalled from a site
When you sign up for the Paid Plan Purchased webhook, you will receive this notification when a site owner purchases a paid plan
When you sign up for the Paid Plan Changed webhook, you will receive this notification when a user changes the app’s paid plan (to another paid plan)

events.name: Paid Plan Auto Renewal Cancelled Webhook

docs.summary: When you sign up for the Paid Plan Auto-Renewal Cancelled webhook, you will receive this notification when a user cancels their paid plan. (The user will remain a paying user until the plan expires)

members.name: isPrimary
members.doc: Whether the supported language is the primary language for the site.

members.name: resolutionMethod
members.doc: How the language will be resolved. For internal use.

members.name: packageName
members.doc: Name of the paid package the site owner has paid for.

members.name: billingCycle
members.doc: Billing cycle type for the user's paid package - monthly/yearly.

members.name: expirationDate
members.doc: App/plan expiration date. Only relevant for yearly plans.

members.name: autoRenewing
members.doc: Whether the app/plan will auto renew on the expiration date.

members.name: instanceId
members.doc: App instance ID - a unique ID assigned to each app in each site.

members.name: appVersion
members.doc: App version installed in this instance.

members.name: isFree
members.doc: Whether the site owner has a free version of the app (and no paid plan is found). Otherwise false

members.name: billing
members.doc: Billing info for the purchased app/plan in this site.

members.name: permissions
members.doc: Permissions included in this app's access token.

members.name: source
members.doc: Plan from bundle or from third party app upgrade.

members.name: locale
members.doc: Language code (ISO 639-1) used on this site.

members.name: paymentCurrency
members.doc: Currency code (ISO 4217) selected to bill customers on this site.

members.name: installedWixApps
members.doc: Names of Wix apps that are installed on this site.

members.name: isMultiLingual
members.doc: Whether multiple languages are supported. When true, an array of supported languages is returned.

members.name: supportedLanguages
members.doc: An array of supported languages. Returned only when isMultiLingual is true.

messages.name: _com_wixpress_market_aim_api_GetAppInstanceByInstanceIdRequest
messages.displayName: Get App Instance By Instance Id Request Object

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. Additional data about the event.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: eventName
members.doc:
- "APP_DASHBOARD_LOADED" - should be fired each time your app's dashboard is loaded by a user,
- "APP_FINISHED_CONFIGURATION" - should be fired when the user is completely onboarded and has completed all required configurations for the app to function properly,
- "APP_UPGRADED" - should be fired when a user upgrades the app to a higher plan (when the upgrade and checkout flow is done on the app side and not via Wix),
- "PRIMARY_ACTION_PERFORMED" - should be fired every time a user triggers the primary action in the app (for example, “review written” for a product reviews app),
- "CUSTOM" -  should be fired for any other event which is not supported by the above. When sending this event. Make sure to also send `customEventName`,
- "CHARGE" - should be fired each time you charge money from the user, can be fired for a new purchase or subscription renewal,
- "FUNDS_RETURNED" - should be fired each time you send money back to the users. Can be for refunds or chargebacks for example.

members.name: customEventName
members.doc: Custom event name. required when eventName = "CUSTOM".

members.name: eventData
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Additional data about the event.

members.name: productId
members.doc: Product to bill the user for (details taken from Developers Center).

members.name: successUrl
members.doc: URL to redirect user to after a successful purchase.

members.name: testCheckout
members.doc: Whether this checkout is for testing purposes only (relevant only for in-app purchases). When true, the price charged will be 0.00

members.name: checkoutUrl
members.doc: Wix checkout URL based on the parameters in the request

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. Script parameters

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: parameters
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Script parameters

members.name: disabled
members.doc: Whether script is disabled or not, defaults to false (not disabled)

messages.name: _com_wixpress_market_aim_api_PaidPlanAutoRenewalCancelled
messages.displayName: Paid Plan Auto Renewal Cancelled Object

members.name: operationTimeStamp
members.doc: Date and time of auto-renewal cancellation.

members.name: cancelReason
members.doc: Reason provided by app for cancellation (if relevant).

members.name: userReason
members.doc: Reason provided by site owner for cancellation (if relevant).

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • NO_CYCLE
  • MONTHLY
  • YEARLY
  • ONE_TIME

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • APP_DASHBOARD_LOADED
  • APP_FINISHED_CONFIGURATION
  • APP_UPGRADED
  • PRIMARY_ACTION_PERFORMED
  • CUSTOM
  • CHARGE
  • FUNDS_RETURNED
